title: So I got Temp-Banned earlier......
body:
...And wow I cannot believe how much of a D-wad I am. Honestly I'm surprised it wasn't perma-ban. I mean just look at this,

> 

14 Day Behavior Suspension

THEJJSLAY,

You have received a 14 day ban following an extensive audit of in-game behavior within recent League of Legends matches.

Your peers judged your behavior to be far below the standards of the League of Legends community. Think through the conversation and reflect on your words. League is an intense, competitive game, but every player deserves respect. Read more about the effort to encourage sportsmanlike play, here.

Here are some chat logs that were identified as negative by other players in the community.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
i play more than him
garenteed
fuck
forgot you had barrier
:U
reksai plz gank
udyr just sat in my lane for a full minute
>.>
wow
you say that like i wasnt running from him and xerath for the entire time
you must be so smart
gj rksai
this is why we ward
wouldnt have helped you
you didnt even have a ward
no it didnt
ut ok
you are acting like its my fault you didnt have a ward up
you dont listen to mia anyways
nah kalsita cant see the map
gotta ping for her or shell die
i dont care if she was carrying
shes fucking r%%%%%ed
ive died 3 fucking times and im behind 1 cs from her
i did
he never came back since i last fucking pinged dumb %%%%
thx
i wish we had a jungler
ours just keeps going top and dying
so kalista
hows top losing
junglers only been top
and you still feed
gj
naut mid
kalista you are abut to lose your inner tower
and you are farming my lane
fucking really
how dumb are you??
im not tunnel visioned
getting my tower was worht more
you
are
fucking
r%%%%%ed
lmao
i should afk
i said i would when kalista fed
and oh look
shes 1/7
gj kalista
dat sheild morg
gj
this FUCKING KALISA
report kalista plz
trolling
thx
kalista doesnt even have fucking boots yet
relaly
plz report her
gj vayne
plz report kalista and reksai they just said they are duo
you both just died
gj
gh
got drag but lost inhibs
or nvm they are splitting
lmao
xD
idiots
GJ KALISTA
UR DA BEST OF DE POTATOOOOS
WE CANT
caps
we cant group becasue kalista is trolling
she is splitting
and is about to die again
and she died
woot
kalista PLZEASEASEADFWFGEF
good god they are bad
bg
report kalista
pushing bot like she said to
> 
GG; get smitten me.
~~I wish I got emails like this when it warns you I probably would have realized that I am a douche without banning~~
~~Although it doesn't show what other people said that doesn't mean what I said is ok~~
~~If only more people like me were banned~~
Lol GG; GET DUNKED ON.
~~I hope I can change so that I do not ever get banned again~~
